title: Collecting Water
description: An illustration showing a hand reaching down to collect water in a glass jar from a reflective surface. The water appears clear, and the surrounding environment includes green foliage and ripples on the water's surface.

title: Microscope
description: A laboratory microscope with two eyepieces for binocular viewing. It features multiple objective lenses mounted on a rotating turret, a stage for holding slides, and various knobs for focusing and adjusting the light.
